price: Ẹ má ṣe mú ọlọ́hun mìíràn mọ́ Allāhu. Dájúdájú èmi ni olùkìlọ̀ pọ́nńbélé fún yín láti ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀.
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿalū maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
